timeline.bodyText: Can wet fix the hashCode function in TableScan directly?
timeline.author: DonnyZone

replies.bodyText:
Hi @DonnyZone  Thanks a lot for looking into this !
There's a discussion for overriding equals()&hashCode() in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/CALCITE-3167
The conclusion is to make equals()&hashCode() final in AbstractRelNode  and  have independent mechanisms to define the equality.
replies.author: jinxing64
